## Candidate.media() method

Returns the first detected media part in the candidate's message. Useful for extracting (for example) an image from a generation expected to create one.

**Signature:**

```typescript
media(): {
        url: string;
        contentType?: string;
    } | null;
```
**Returns:**

{ url: string; contentType?: string; } \| null

The first detected `media` part in the candidate.
